techs.name: Magical Theory
techs.quote: 'Magic is the true wonder of the world' - Twilight Sparkle

techs.name: Replaceable Parts
techs.quote: 'Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.' - Henry Ford

techs.name: Ancient Changeling Tech
techs.quote: ' 'Queen' Chrysalis has a good ring to it,doesnt it?' - Queen Chrysalis

techs.name: Secrets of the Arctic
techs.quote: 'The world cannot live without the Arctic; it affects every living thing on Earth and acts as a virtual thermostat, reflecting sunlight and cooling the planet.' - Phillipe Cousteau

techs.name: Pottery
techs.quote: 'Shall the clay say to him that fashioneth it, what makest thou?' - Bible Isaiah 45:9

techs.name: Animal Husbandry
techs.quote: 'Thou shalt not muzzle the ox when he treadeth out the corn.' - Bible Deuteronomy 25:4

techs.name: Archery
techs.quote: 'The haft of the arrow has been feathered with one of the eagle's own plumes, we often give our enemies the means of our own destruction' - Aesop

techs.name: Mining
techs.quote: 'The meek shall inherit the Earth, but not its mineral rights.' - J. Paul Getty

techs.name: Basic Fishing
techs.quote: 'Do not tell fish stories where the people know you; but particularly, don't tell them where they know the fish.' - Mark Twain
